column1: Dementia: Causes, Treatments and Research (Mental Health) MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Dementia MSc, offered jointly by the Division of Psychiatry and Queen Square Institute of Neurology, tackles one of the biggest global health problems facing society today. It provides research-oriented and cutting-edge training in the study of dementia and its scientific basis, led by international leaders in the science and practice of dementia. Two specialised pathways, in mental health and in neuroscience, are offered.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
